page.title: 17Local Superstitions.
page.content: There are many strange stories about ghosts in and around Kennethmont, but the most common one concerns "The Green Lady". The Green Lady is supposed to live in the Old Graveyard, where many people claim to have seen her. The night of July the 10th is supposed to be the night when many ghosts, including the Green Lady, are abroad; but there seems to be no story to explain why this should be. The Green Lady is reported to be a young girl wearing a green dress and flowers in her hair. In addition, most reports state that she wanders barefoot. The stable at Leith Hall is also supposed to be haunted, this time by a group of pipers wearing the Campbell tartan. There are occasionally claims that they have been seen marching down to Leith Hall or marching in the grounds.
